name: rocm-opencl

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: generator
variants.description: the build system generator to use

description: OpenCL: Open Computing Language on ROCclr

dependencies.name: aqlprofile
dependencies.description:
HSA extension AMD AQL profile library. Provides AQL packets helper
methods for perfcounters (PMC) and SQ threadtraces (SQTT).

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: comgr
dependencies.description:
This provides various Lightning Compiler related services. It currently
contains one library, the Code Object Manager (Comgr)

dependencies.name: gl
dependencies.description: Placeholder for external EGL(OpenGL) libraries from hardware vendors

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: hsa-rocr-dev
dependencies.description:
This repository includes the user mode API nterfaces and libraries
necessary for host applications to launch computer kernels to available
HSA ROCm kernel agents.AMD Heterogeneous System Architecture HSA - Linux
HSA Runtime for Boltzmann (ROCm) platforms.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependencies.name: rocm-core
dependencies.description:
rocm-core is a utility which can be used to get ROCm release version. It
also provides the Lmod modules files for the ROCm release.
getROCmVersion function provides the ROCm version.

dependent_to.name: miopengemm
dependent_to.description: An OpenCL general matrix multiplication (GEMM) API and kernel generator

dependent_to.name: mivisionx
dependent_to.description:
MIVisionX toolkit is a set of comprehensive computer vision and machine
intelligence libraries, utilities, and applications bundled into a
single toolkit.

dependent_to.name: hwloc
dependent_to.description:
The Hardware Locality (hwloc) software project. The Portable Hardware
Locality (hwloc) software package provides a portable abstraction
(across OS, versions, architectures, ...) of the hierarchical topology
of modern architectures, including NUMA memory nodes, sockets, shared
caches, cores and simultaneous multithreading. It also gathers various
system attributes such as cache and memory information as well as the
locality of I/O devices such as network interfaces, InfiniBand HCAs or
GPUs. It primarily aims at helping applications with gathering
information about modern computing hardware so as to exploit it
accordingly and efficiently.

dependent_to.name: miopen-opencl
dependent_to.description: AMD's library for high performance machine learning primitives.

dependent_to.name: rpp
dependent_to.description:
Radeon Performance Primitives (RPP) library is a comprehensive high-
performance computer vision library for AMD (CPU and GPU) with HIP and
OPENCL back-ends

dependent_to.name: babelstream
dependent_to.description:
Measure memory transfer rates to/from global device memory on GPUs. This
benchmark is similar in spirit, and based on, the STREAM benchmark for
CPUs.
